passages.text:
Welcome! What brings you to our island community?
I'm retired. 
I'm on vacation!
I'm just passing through.
passages.name: Start

passages.text: Excellent! We have many activities to keep you busy during retirement. Fishing festival
passages.name: I'm retired.

passages.text: Excellent! This is a great spot to spend a holiday. Fishing festival
passages.name: I'm on vacation!

passages.text: I see. A wanderer of sorts? Fishing festival
passages.name: I'm just passing through.

passages.text:
Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Mayor Thompson. You've come at a good time! Today marks the start of our annual fishing festival. 
I'm here to fish!
Fishing festival?
...
passages.name: Fishing festival

passages.text:
In fact, the ferry you took here will be the last ship coming to port for the next five days!
I'm just in time!
Do you have enough supplies on the island?
So you're telling me I'm stuck here for five days?

links.name: Do you have enough supplies on the island?
So you're telling me I'm stuck here for five days?

passages.name: Festival 2

passages.text: Boats disrupt the fish, so we lock down the port during the festival. But don't worry, we have comfortable living arrangements for visitors and we'll have enough fish to satisfy a giant's appetite! Festival 4
passages.name: Festival 3

passages.text: There's no pressure to participate, but here's a festival badge and a pamphlet about the rules, just in case. I'll just collect the entrance fee now. Festival 4.1
passages.name: Festival 4

passages.text: When you're ready to call it a night, talk to Amanda by the brick buildings behind me. She'll get you setup with proper accomodations for the duration of the festival. Ready, set, FISH! Festival 5
passages.name: Festival 4.1
